sentences.en: A computer in the machine creates an image on the screen.
sentences.cn: 机器上的计算机在屏幕上产生了影像。

sentences.en: a computer with an 18-inch colour screen
sentences.cn: 带18英寸彩色屏幕的电脑

sentences.en: A series of largely formless images rushed across the screen.
sentences.cn: 一连串相当混乱的影像在屏幕上闪过。

sentences.en: A small-screen portable TV can be a good investment.
sentences.cn: 小屏幕的便携式电视机很值得买。

sentences.en: All women over 50 will be regularly screened.
sentences.cn: 所有50岁以上女性都将定期接受检查。

sentences.en: As the pictures flashed on the screen, the newsman continued talking.
sentences.cn: 随着屏幕上图片的切换，记者继续报道。

sentences.en: Everyone is familiar with the TV screen's hypnotic power.
sentences.cn: 大家都很熟悉电视屏幕的吸引力。

sentences.en: For added protection choose a lipstick with a sun screen.
sentences.cn: 选择防晒护唇膏来增强保护。

sentences.en: He was horrified at some of the images he saw on the screen.
sentences.cn: 从屏幕上看到的一些图像让他感到很恐怖

sentences.en: He went on staring at the TV screen .
sentences.cn: 他继续盯着电视屏幕看。

sentences.en: His life was saved by a quarter-inch-thick bullet-proof steel screen.
sentences.cn: 多亏一块1/4英寸厚的防弹钢板，他才捡了条命。

sentences.en: I don't like taking my kit off on screen.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢在银幕上表演裸戏。

sentences.en: It was quite a shock to see my face on that screen!
sentences.cn: 从那个屏幕上看到我的脸，真让人惊愕不已。

sentences.en: Live concerts are never quite the same on the small screen.
sentences.cn: 电视转播的音乐会与现场音乐会不可同日而语。

sentences.en: Many viewers have strong opinions about violence on the screen.
sentences.cn: 许多观众对银幕暴力心存反感。

sentences.en: McKay walked slowly toward this screen, feeling a growing tenseness.
sentences.cn: 麦凯缓缓地朝这个屏幕走来，每走一步心情都更加紧张。

sentences.en: Producers decided to end her on-screen romance with Pierce Lawton.
sentences.cn: 制片人决定结束她在影片中与皮尔斯·劳顿的恋情。

sentences.en: The film is being screened around the country.
sentences.cn: 这部电影正在全国放映。

sentences.en: The scriptwriter helped him to adapt his novel for the screen.
sentences.cn: 编剧帮助他将其所著小说改编成电影。

sentences.en: They were quick to dismiss rumours of an off-screen romance.
sentences.cn: 他们迅速否认了两人在现实生活中是情侣关系的传言。
